title: Secluded Cook Islands Aitutaki Opulence with Daily Breakfast, NZ$250 Dining Credit & Airport Transfers
description:
Surrender to paradise's embrace at Resort Tava'e, a hidden treasure on Aitutaki in the Cook Islands, where turquoise waters kiss powder-white sands. This exclusive sanctuary offers an intoxicating blend of Polynesian charm and five-star indulgence, inviting you to slip into island time where worries disappear like footprints in the sand.

Savour culinary poetry at the oceanfront restaurant. Here, master chefs transform the island's bounty into gastronomic masterpieces. By day, relax by one of two swimming pools, and by night, bask under a canopy of stars while sipping sundowners in a poolside cabana. Dive into nature's own aquarium, teeming with kaleidoscopic marine life, with direct beach access just steps from your private haven.

Adventure beckons beyond the resort with untouched rainforests, secret waterfalls and Aitutaki Lagoon awaiting discovery. Explore local villages and experience centuries-old traditions in vivid technicolour. Return to your sophisticated retreat where your every desire is anticipated, and every sunset promises to outdo the last.

title: Boutique Lagoon Romance in the Cook Islands
description: Escape to the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the romantic Pacific Resort Aitutaki Nui - named the 'Cook Islands' Leading Resort 2018' in the World Travel Awards. One of only two Cook Islands' resorts included in the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this multi-award-winning resort offers luxurious boutique bungalows with stunning views of the azure ocean. Experience sheer romance and relaxation with NZ$500 Food & Beverage and Spa credit, daily breakfast, return airport transfers, use of kayaks and snorkelling equipment and more included.

title: Stay in Boutique Luxury Beside an Azure Lagoon in Dreamy Aitutaki
description: Escape to the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the romantic Pacific Resort Aitutaki - named the 'Cook Islands' Leading Resort 2018' in the World Travel Awards. One of only two Cook Islands' resorts included in the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this multi-award-winning resort offers luxurious boutique bungalows with stunning views of the azure ocean. Experience sheer romance and relaxation for two, with daily breakfast, a selection of gourmet two-course dinners, return airport transfers, use of kayaks and snorkelling equipment and more included.

title: Cook Islands Ultimate Luxury: Aitutaki Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Return Transfers
description:
In the heart of the shimmering South Pacific lies the beautifully remote Pacific Resort Aitutaki. A short flight from Rarotonga, the serene blue-green lagoon, nodding palm trees and crystal-clear skies of this five-star escape will take your breath away.

The resort is a true taste of heaven, with just 29 intimate thatched beachfront bungalows delivering unparalleled seclusion and hospitality. One of only two Cook Islands resorts included in the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this far-flung island paradise is yours to enjoy at your own pace.

Whether that's taking a refreshing dip in the palm-fringed infinity pool, kayaking the length of the island, being pampered at the onsite spa or finding your spot among the palms on Aitutaki's secluded beachfront, you're sure to find your bliss in this divine corner or the world.

title: BEST OF 2019: Boutique Lagoon Romance in the Cook Islands
description: Escape to the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the romantic Pacific Resort Aitutaki. One of only two Cook Islands' resorts included in the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this multi-award-winning resort offers luxurious boutique bungalows with stunning views of the azure ocean. Experience sheer romance and relaxation with NZ$500 Food & Beverage and Spa credit, daily breakfast, return airport transfers, use of kayaks and snorkelling equipment and more included.

title: Cook Islands Aitutaki Five-Star Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Three-Course Dinner & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Beautifully remote, this luxurious five-star escape at Pacific Resort Aitutaki in the heart of the South Pacific is just as nature intended. A vision of pristine seclusion, the shimmering blue-green lagoon, nodding palm trees and crystal-clear skies will take your breath away. This adults-only (12+) resort is a short flight from Rarotonga, and offers just 29 intimate beachfront bungalows, delivering unparalleled privacy and serenity in the idyllic Cook Islands.

This far-flung island resort is a piece of paradise to be enjoyed at your own pace. Indulge in world-class dining at Rapae Bay Restaurant, where an elegant menu is matched with exceptional service, be pampered at the world-class Tiare spa, and take a refreshing dip in the palm-fringed infinity pool. Immerse yourself in the incredible landscapes by kayaking the length of the island, or find your spot among the palms and volcanic rock formations of Aitutaki's secluded beachfront.

title: Blissfully Remote Cook Islands Five-Star Paradise with Daily Breakfast & NZ$500 Credit
description:
Beautifully remote, this luxurious escape in the heart of the South Pacific is just as nature intended. A vision of pristine isolation, the shimmering blue-green lagoon, nodding palm trees and crystal-clear skies at the five-star Pacific Resort Aitutaki will take your breath away. This is a true taste of heaven where just 29 intimate thatched beachfront bungalows deliver unparalleled seclusion and award-winning serenity in the iconic Cook Islands.

A short flight from Rarotonga, one of only two Cook Islands resorts included in the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and winner of the World Travel Awards leading Oceania resort in 2020, consider this far-flung island resort your piece of paradise to enjoy at your own pace. Whether that's taking a refreshing dip in the palm-fringed infinity pool, kayaking the length of the island, being pampered at the award-winning spa, or finding your spot among the palms and volcanic rocks scattered on Aitutaki's secluded beachfront.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Days in paradise begin with à la carte breakfast and Aitutaki Lagoon views at Rapae Bay Restaurant
- Find inner serenity with NZ$500 resort credit per room to spend on fine dining, poolside cocktails and indulgent spa treatments at Rapae Bay Restaurant, Black Rock Bar or Tiare Spa
- Enjoy a welcome to remember with a fresh Coconut Nu and a bottle of wine in-bungalow on arrival
- Stay connected in this far-flung oasis with NZ$50 Wi-Fi credit
- Complimentary use of kayaks, snorkelling equipment and bicycles

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: Aitutaki Beachfront Cook Islands Paradise with Daily Breakfast, NZ$250 Dining Credit & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Wake up to the South Pacific’s sun-drenched sands and beyond-blue waters at this boutique resort, nestled on an intimate atoll in the Cook Islands. With just 23 beautifully appointed bungalows and villas, this beachfront resort will whisk you away to an unplugged paradise.

Immerse yourself in island culture, snorkel or kayak in the crystal-clear and coral-rich waters, or hike through the ultra-lush foliage. In between adventures, find your zen at the onsite spa with a rejuvenating facial, massage on the beach or beauty treatments. Couples can find romance in the adults-only wing of the resort, while families can enjoy boundless fun in their dedicated wing.

There’s no need to leave the property to treat your taste buds. Start your day with a barista-made coffee paired with tropical delights, from cinnamon toast with grilled banana and crispy bacon to a tropical fruit platter with coconut and yoghurt. Take advantage of your generous dining credit for lunch or dinner, with fresh fish, various salads and sandwiches on offer.

title: Secluded Aitutaki Cook Islands Beachfront Resort with Two Pools & Restaurant
description:
Escape to a secluded paradise in the South Pacific, with a stay at this tropical haven on the tranquil shores of the Pacific Ocean. This tropical haven offers unrivaled access to the region’s vibrant marine life, inviting you to unwind and indulge in the beauty of island living. Savour authentic Polynesian flavours at Resort Tava’e Restaurant & Bar, where the menu is inspired by the island's rich bounty.

For those seeking adventure, the resort is a gateway to untouched natural wonders, lush rainforests and hidden waterfalls. Explore the local culture with a visit to the nearby village, where traditional Polynesian crafts and dances are still practised. As the sun sets, take a refreshing dip in the resort's infinity pool, overlooking the breathtaking ocean.

title: Adults-Only Private Cook Islands Escape on the Edge of Aitutaki Lagoon
description:
Experience barefoot luxury at its finest in the dreamy Cook Islands with an adults-only escape at Aitutaki Lagoon Private Island Resort. Wake up to sweeping views of one of the world’s most beautiful lagoons and immerse yourself in the striking beauty of this private island - easily reachable with a scenic two-minute boat ride from the main island of Aitutaki. Set on a blissfully secluded islet on the edge of Aitutaki Lagoon, surrounded by the most brilliant turquoise waters you’ll ever see, Aitutaki Lagoon Private Island Resort promises to deliver a quintessential South Pacific experience, where you can leave the world behind and relax on the white-sand beachfront or snorkel in warm waters among colourful coral and tropical fish.

The resort offers everything you need for a romantic escape, including a spa, restaurant serving delicious local fare and a collection of beautifully designed Polynesian-inspired bungalows. When you’re ready to explore the intimate island and learn more about its culture, the resort offers a range of complimentary daily activities including island dancing, coconut husking and ukulele lessons, and complimentary watersports equipment including kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkelling equipment to explore the underwater world of the Cook Islands. Welcome to paradise.

title: Tropical Cook Islands Aitutaki Paradise with Spa & Restaurant
description: Wake up in South Pacific paradise at Tamanu Beach Resort, nestled on an intimate atoll in the Cook Islands. Beautifully appointed bungalows and villas offer a serene unplugged escape in a pristine tropical setting. Immerse yourself in island culture, snorkel or kayak the crystal-clear waters, or hike through the verdant foliage. In between adventures, enjoy international flavours at the onsite restaurant and bar, or find your zen in the spa.
